final_recap:
DEV: Lisle village obliterated when Rance's latent Mage-Gift violently awakened during bandit attack; villagers carried off; Senta found and Chose him; evidence discovered—bandits wore hidden red robes (Karsite), fled toward Menmellith; theorized captives for blood magic ritual; Rance collapsed from Gift-shock; Senta transported him unconscious four days to Haven; arrived Healers' Collegium; reported to Queen's Circle via full mind-merge with Talia; Mage-Gift confirmed (unprecedented ability to access nodes without trance); Karsite involvement (blood magic/Sun-Priests) confirmed; quartered at Healer's cottage for safety; diplomatic inquiries to neighboring nations ordered; Rance and Talia share complete memories bidirectionally; decided to formalize connection officially to Selenay/Circle but keep public unaware; Rance agreed with semi-official structure to protect Mage-Gift secret; Talia and Rance consummated relationship—she lost virginity, discovered arousal through degradation/domination, was marked and filled.

PEND: Rance's memories still blocked; Mage-Gift training without living teachers; Karse's blood magic purpose; fate of captured villagers; meeting with Selenay imminent (under two candlemarks); must present composed facade while dealing with transformation; implementation of co-advisor structure unresolved; Talia's ability to function professionally after intense experience uncertain; Alberich's training approach uncertain; managing security risk of shared Queen's Own memories; political management of unprecedented dual-knowledge situation.

all_entities.c: Rance reported Lisle destruction and Karsite blood magic involvement to Queen's Circle via full mind-merge with Talia
